description:
Save time & money with the Walmart app, featuring Savings Catcher and Pharmacy. 

Our in-store shopping tools make it easy to find items in your store, check prices and availability, and more. Share your location with us so we'll know which Walmart store you're in.

Looking to grab great values on the go? The Walmart app helps you find and buy quality products at unbeatable prices whether you’re shopping at home, in our stores or anywhere in between.
	 --Introducing Savings Catcher, a New Way to Catch Savings!--  1) Scan your store receipt using the Walmart app.
2) Savings Catcher compares the prices of eligible items on your receipt against the advertised deals offered by top competitors in your area.
3) If a lower advertised price is found, we’ll give you back the difference on a Walmart Rewards eGift Card.
* Now get 2X the Reward Dollars from Savings Catcher by redeeming to your Bluebird Account, a checking and debit alternative brought to you by Walmart and American Express.
 --Savings Made Easy--
* Shop for hundreds of thousands of items beyond what’s in our stores.
* Get free shipping when you choose our store pickup option. Simply pick up your items at any Walmart store. 
* Enjoy free, easy returns. Ship your item back to us or stop by any Walmart store for a quick, in-person return.
* Shop Rollbacks and Value of the Day to save a bundle.
 --Shop Smarter-- * Check product prices, ratings/reviews, store inventory and more.
* Scan barcodes and QR codes for additional shopping information.  * Type, speak or scan items to build your Shopping List and track total cost. 
* Find store hours and directions.
* Browse your Walmart store’s Weekly Ad.
 --Pharmacy--
* Order, refill and transfer  * View pharmacy prescriptions
 --We’ve Won Awards!--
* Mobile App of the Year & Mobile Retailer of the Year (Mobile Commerce Daily)
* #1 in Commerce (Mobile Excellence Awards)
* Best in Class for Mobile Commerce & Marketing (eTail)

Save money. Live better.
trackCensoredName: Walmart - Savings Catcher, Shopping and Pharmacy App
